name: Alpha Five Settings File
summary: Settings files created by Alpha Five, an IDE used to develop Web, mobile, and desktop applications; contains Web Project settings for a profile; holds data such as the project name and the path to the "WebProject" folder that holds project files like .A5W , .A5WCMP , .PNG , and .A5RPT ; located in the same location as the "WebProjects" folder, which is inside your project folder.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
